document.title: BUSINESS AND MANAGEMENT Statewide Program of Study Framework: Marketing Career Cluster

planning and development

company image and to meet other professionals (e.g., explain the importance
of company involvement in community activities, propose community issues
for company involvement, participate in community outreach activities)

needs to designers (e.g., describe the use of color in advertisements, describe
the elements of design, explain the use of illustrations in advertisements, discuss

effective advertising layouts, identify types of drawing media, explain the

costs (e.g., explain the nature of a promotional plan, coordinate activities in the
promotional mix)

needed to communicate
information about

and/or ideas to achieve
a desired outcome

Employ marketing-information to aid in making and evaluating channel-management decisions (e.g., track channel management cost data, collect
product quality data to aid in making channel-management decisions, obtain
and track information about domestic and foreign suppliers/manufacturers)

Manage marketing information to guide and assess promotional activities (e.g.,
measure media audience, leverage data to recommend personalized, relevant
campaigns and support real-time customization of customer interactions)

sales analysis reports)

strategies needed to
gather, access, synthesize,
evaluate, and disseminate
information for use in
making business decisions

pipeline (e.g., explain new product-development processes)

C1C8D37F1C8544B8AC3DCD329FCD2D3C.description:
Apply quality assurances to enhance product/service offerings (e.g., determine
the impact of product standards’ issues associated with global business)

1851EF856EC84BFC940590C512AFC09A.description:

positioning concept for a new product idea, communicate core values of
product/service, identify product’s/service’s competitive advantage)

B48F9A20D5E34E4FA66225EA192956AD.description:

recognition (e.g., assess product-packaging requirements, evaluate graphic
design on packages, evaluate adequacy of product packaging)

understanding of the
concepts and processes

maintain, and improve
a product or service mix
in response to market
opportunities and to build
brand for the organization

impact of marketing decisions on the environment)

a business’s image (e.g., document marketing processes)

08B86CEF51FA4128836E626F8C22E3D3.description:

ensure marketing’s efficiency and effectiveness (e.g., cleanse existing marketing
data to maintain relevancy, apply marketing analytics)

4368855A99A94CF7A504CCDBE172ADEF.description:

customer information and company image (e.g., describe how to
maintain security of marketing data, explain security considerations in

sources of relevant, new marketing data, evaluate options to purchase or
sell marketing data)

enhance a business’s financial wellbeing (e.g., track invoices)

understanding of the
processes and systems
implemented to monitor,
plan, and control the
day-to-day activities
required for continued
business functioning

(e.g., artificial intelligence, ecommerce, video production)

E42B6D8FA2004C7E858A61E1F7CAB9F9.description:

to manage and perform work responsibilities (e.g., analyze the impact of
technology on marketing, automate services, analytical tracking guide business
decision-making)

access, process, maintain,
evaluate, and disseminate

efforts (e.g., how to determine internal/external resource requirements
and responsibilities for projects).

organization (e.g., staff key marketing positions)

Explain how to manage staff growth and development to increase productivity
and employee satisfaction (e.g., how to ensure staff understanding of
responsibilities, duties, functions, and authority levels, supervise marketing
positions, determine adequacy of training courses, assess marketing personnel’s
ability to react to market developments)

understanding of the
techniques and systems
that businesses use to plan,
staff, lead, and organize its
human resources

interactions (e.g., explain the impact of business customs and practices on
global trade, describe the nature of business customs and practices in the
North American market and regions of the world)

F56DA06AF6C9462889A363B582820EF3.description:

understanding of techniques,
strategies, and systems used
to foster self-understanding
and enhance relationships
with others
